metadata.title: CVE-2017-11428 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: OneLogin Ruby-SAML 1.6.0 and earlier may incorrectly utilize the results ofXML DOM traversal and canonicalization APIs in such a way that an attackermay be able to manipulate the SAML data without invalidating thecryptographic signature, allowing the attack to potentially bypassauthentication to SAML service providers.

criterions.comment: ruby-saml: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
